meanings.definition: Loose-fitting pants made of soft fabric, typically worn for exercise or lounging.
meanings.sent1: I wear my sweatpants to the gym for comfort.
meanings.sent2: She loves to relax at home in her cozy sweatpants.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear my sweatpants as a hat!
meanings.sent4: His sweatpants were like a warm hug on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sweatpants stood out in the sea of black leggings.

meanings.definition: A pair of pants designed for comfort and casual wear.
meanings.sent1: My favorite sweatpants have a drawstring waist.
meanings.sent2: He wore his sweatpants to the casual Friday office meeting.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked funny trying to walk in oversized sweatpants.
meanings.sent4: Her sweatpants were a symbol of relaxation after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the sweatpants was like a cloud against his skin.
